attributes.action:
Prioritise TLF WORKERS
Blackcab and Minicab drivers for Covid-19 vaccination
attributes.additional_details: Cab drivers,taxi drivers and bus drivers (ALL TFL WORKERS) We are on really high risk group!!!
attributes.background: TFL WORKERS,BLACKCAB,BUS AND MINICAB DRIVERS HAS TO BE GET VACCINE QUICK ITS POSSIBLE!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564819
